A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Having read all the other reviews\, it is quite apparent that we're all mourning after this dreadful film.
I'm a huge Star Wars fan\, as i'm sure we all are\, but I wholeheartedly agree that Star Wars died with this movie.
How the "critics" can give this 91% is totally beyond me.
I watched it for the 2nd time on DVD last night and was genuinely bored 20 minutes from the end.
